import { OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { LayoutService } from './service/app.layout.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './app.menu.component.html' }) export class AppMenuComponent implements OnInit { model: any[] = []; constructor(public layoutService: LayoutService) { } ngOnInit() { this.model = [ { label: 'Home', items: [ { label: 'Dash - Grade', icon: 'pi pi-fw pi-home', routerLink: ['/'] }, { label: 'Dash - Produtividade', icon: 'pi pi-chart-line', routerLink: ['/'] } ] } ]; } }
